response.original_title: A Far Afternoon: a Painted Saga by Krishen Khanna
response.overview: In a career spanning over fifty years, Krishen Khanna has established himself as one of the most prolific and influential painters in the Indian art landscape.' A Far Afternoon' is a filmmaker's attempt to memorialize the artistic process involved in the creation of the eponymous art work, and trace some of the influences of the artist.
response.title: A Far Afternoon: a Painted Saga by Krishen Khanna
